QuestData.Title: The Burlap Grind
QuestData.Description: Okayyy... well, she's not eating anybody. That's a good start.$B$BShe must want more kafa, but we gotta give her somethin' to do with all the extra energy...$B$BI got it! The Burlap Trail! She can smash hozen out there all day!$B$B<Burrberry turns to the massive beast.>$B$BWhat do you think, pretty girl? Wanna smash hozens?!$B$BI think so. Here, feed her my emergency flask of kafa. She likes you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Feed the Flask of Kafa to Kota Kon at Kota Basecamp, then kill 100 Hozen along The Burlap Trail.
QuestData.CompletionText: Don't push our luck... we promised her hozens-smashies.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! That was VIOLENT.$B$BNot sure what I was expecting...$B$BThanks to you, I think we may have just formed a mutually beneficial relationship with the Terror of Kota Peak.
